alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sheridan County through 100 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Menlo to 5 miles southwest of Grinnell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grinnell around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hoxie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
